mapper.select: SELECT h_id, wheelchair_desc, wheelchair_model, wheelchair_area, wheelchair_type, wheelchair_price, wheelchair_floor, wheelchair_address, wheelchair_image FROM t_wheelchair

SELECT h_id, wheelchair_desc, wheelchair_price, wheelchair_type, wheelchair_area, wheelchair_floor, community_name, wheelchair_address, wheelchair_linkman, wheelchair_model, wheelchair_area, wheelchair_oriented, wheelchair_detailes_img FROM t_wheelchair WHERE h_id=#{id}
select * from t_wheelchair where publisher = #{publisher} limit #{page},#{limit}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_wheelchair SET wheelchair_desc = #{wheelchairDesc}, wheelchair_model = #{wheelchairModel}, wheelchair_area = #{wheelchairArea}, wheelchair_floor = #{wheelchairFloor}, wheelchair_type = #{wheelchairType}, wheelchair_price = #{wheelchairPrice}, wheelchair_address = #{wheelchairAddress}, wheelchair_oriented = #{wheelchairOriented}, wheelchair_linkman = #{wheelchairLinkMan}, community_name = #{communityName} WHERE h_id = #{hID}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_wheelchair h WHERE CONCAT( h.community_name, h.wheelchair_desc, h.wheelchair_model ) LIKE CONCAT("%", #{keywords}, "%")
SELECT * FROM t_wheelchair h ORDER BY wheelchair_price DESC
SELECT * FROM t_wheelchair h ORDER BY wheelchair_price ASC
